name: vince
description: Vince is a self-hosted privacy-first web analytics platform similar to Plausible. It tracks visits without cookies and provides clear charts and metrics via a minimal dashboard.
features: Privacy-first analytics: Track website visits without cookies or personal data collection.
Simple dashboard: View traffic metrics in a clean, minimal dashboard without complexity.
Page views: Monitor page views, unique visitors, and bounce rates for your websites.
Referrer tracking: See where visitors come from with referrer and UTM parameter tracking.
Lightweight script: Use a tiny tracking script that doesn't impact page load performance.
Real-time data: View current visitor activity and traffic in real-time.
Multiple sites: Track multiple websites from a single installation with separate dashboards.
No cookie banners: Avoid GDPR cookie consent requirements with cookieless tracking.
Geographic data: View visitor locations without tracking individual users.
Device breakdown: See which devices and browsers visitors use for optimization insights.
Custom events: Track custom events and conversions to measure specific user actions.
API access: Access analytics data programmatically through the REST API.
